suwishesha parisarika paddhathi surakima ha ee aasha්ritha wana waga pa්rawardhanaya, aarakshawa ha nadaththuwala janawasa aashi්rathawa thuru wiyan sakasimata dayaka wana gas wawimen apa jiwathwana parisaraye haritha bawa pa්rawardhanaya ha ehi pa්rathilabha janathawata labena bawa thahawuru kirima, hayanayata lak wu bhumi pa්radesha suwishesha ruk ropana ka්ramaweda thulin pa්rathisthapanaya wadasatahane aramuna yi.

ee awashyathawaya deshiya menma jathyantharawath siduwana athara guwan widuliya, rupawahiniya wani widyuth sanniwedana madhya thulath pathira gos athi bawa prakata karunaki.parani maha therawarun thula pawathi piripun bhikshu aakalpa, theruwan kerehi athi aparimitha gaurawadaraya, thama aacharya praweniya wenuwen dakwana mahangu alma,podu mahajanathawage delowa subasiddhiya sandaha apakapawima wani suprathipanna gunayen upashantha mahaniya yathiwarayan wadasitina kala shasanaya nisaka washayenma uthum pinkethak wanawamaya.nirantharayen santhushtiya parama dhanaya kara gath, maithri wiharanayehi niyuthu mema maha yathindrayan wahanse, lo sasun wada wadima pinisa siya kalayath, shramayath, shakthiyath kapa karamin salasana lada sewaya sandaha kollupitiye walukarama maha wiharaya, niwanthidiya mahendrarama wiharasthanaya, nawinne isipathanaramaya , panadura galthude siri siddhaththaramaya yana wiharasthana sakshi darayi.1954 pebarawari 09 wana dina maharagama di janma labhaya lada nahimiyo 1968 nowambar masa wisi deweni dina pawidi bimata athulath wuha.
